Back to Sergei Prokofiev

Sergei Prokofiev

Juvenilia

1901–1908

Total duration: 36'

  • 1. Tarantella in D minor
  • 2. Melody in E-flat major
  • 3. Presto in C major
  • 4. March in F major
  • 5. Vivo in G minor
  • 6. Romanza in D minor
  • 7. Allegretto in A minor
  • 8. Allegretto in C minor
  • 9. Allegro in A-flat major
  • 10. Minuet in F minor
  • 11. Scherzo in C major
  • 12. Allegro in D minor
  • 13. Waltz in G minor
  • 14. March in F minor
  • 15. Prestissimo in C major
  • 16. Study-Scherzo in C major
  • 17. Fugue in D major
  • 18. Scherzo in D major

Prokofiev wrote a large amount of juvenilia, of which most is unpublished. The collection here corresponds to that given in the edition by M. Reitich for Ricordi.

Recommended editions

  • Ricordi · Manoscritti infantili · ed. M. Reitich

1. Tarantella in D minor

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5

2. Melody in E-flat major

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 2

Difficulty: 2

Difficulty: 3.5

14. March in F minor

This march also exists in a later version (op. 12 no. 1).

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5
